TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HttpMethodConstraint extends System.Object implements class System.Web.Routing.IRouteConstraint

summary.span: 使你能够在 ASP.NET 确定 URL 是否匹配路由时定义允许使用的 HTTP 谓词。

span.span: Enables you to define which HTTP verbs are allowed when ASP.NET routing determines whether a URL matches a route.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类可让你将路由匹配限制为某些 HTTP 谓词。The class enables you to limit route matching to certain HTTP verbs. 例如，你可以指定仅当请求的 HTTP 谓词为时才将路由视为 URL 的匹配项 `POST` 。For example, you can specify that a route is considered a match for a URL only when the HTTP verb for the request is `POST`. 若要设置路由匹配的约束，请将 类的属性设置 为类的实例 。To set constraints for route matching, you set the property of the class to an instance of the class. 若要设置 HTTP 谓词约束，请将一个字典元素的值设置为一个 对象，将该键设置为任意名称。To set an HTTP verb constraint, you set the value of one dictionary element to an object and the key to any name. 在 方法中，当 ASP.NET 路由确定路由是否与 URL 匹配时，将包含路由允许的所有 HTTP 谓词。In the method, you include all the HTTP verbs that are allowed for the route when ASP.NET routing determines whether the route matches a URL. ## Examples 下面的示例演示一个 对象，该对象的 属性包含一个项，该项具有一个名为的键， `httpMethod` 并且其值为 类的实例。The following example shows a object whose property contains an item that has a key named `httpMethod` and that has a value that is an instance of the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Routing.Route.Constraints#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.Route.Constraints/cs/Global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Routing.Route.Constraints#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.Route.Constraints/vb/Global.asax#1)]

summary.span: 确定请求是否是使用某一个已允许对路由使用的 HTTP 谓词发出的。

span.span: Determines whether the request was made with an HTTP verb that is one of the allowed verbs for the route.

returns.span: 当 ASP.NET 路由处理请求时，如果该请求是通过使用允许的 HTTP 谓词发出的，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: When ASP.NET routing is processing a request, if the request was made by using an allowed HTTP verb; otherwise, .

span.span: When ASP.NET routing is constructing a URL, if the supplied values contain an HTTP verb that matches one of the allowed HTTP verbs; otherwise, .
The default is .
